abstract: Carl C. Icahn and Eastbourne Capital have won the support of another activist shareholder in their proxy contest with Amylin Pharmaceuticals.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn and Eastbourne Capital have won the support of another activist shareholder in their proxy contest with Amylin Pharmaceuticals.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn and Eastbourne Capital won the banking of a fellow advocate shareholder in their proxy battle with Amylin Pharmaceuticals.

headline.main: Advocate Investor Backs Icahn in Amylin Contest
